text: Hippy Was Gipsy () is a South Korean R&B; duo consisting of members Jflow and Sep. They debuted in 2016 with the EP Island, and have since released three full-length albums: Tree (2017), Language (2018), and Empty Hands (2018). Tree won awards for best R&B; album at both the 2018 Korean Music Awards and the 2018 Korean Hip-hop Awards. == Discography == === Studio albums === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !
